mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cs_reply (reply_id, cs_number, content, reply_writer, reg_date) VALUES (cs_reply_seq.NEXTVAL, #{csNumber}, #{content}, #{replyWriter}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT reply_id, cs_number, content, reply_writer, reg_date FROM cs_reply WHERE cs_number = #{csNumber} ORDER BY reply_id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE cs_reply SET content = #{content} WHERE reply_id = #{replyId}
